botan.cert.x509.x509_ca

X.509 Certificate Authority

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class X509CAImpl;
This class represents X.509 Certificate Authorities (CAs).

X509Certificate signRequest(in PKCS10Request req, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in X509Time not_before, in X509Time not_after);
Sign a PKCS#10 Request.

Params:
PKCS10Request req the request to sign
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
X509Time not_before the starting time for the certificate
X509Time not_after the expiration time for the certificate

Returns:
resulting certificate

const const(X509Certificate) caCertificate();
Get the certificate of this CA.

Returns:
CA certificate

const X509CRL newCRL(RandomNumberGenerator rng, Duration next_update = 0.seconds);
Create a new and empty CRL for this CA.

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng the random number generator to use
Duration next_update the time to set in next update in seconds as the offset from the current time

Returns:
new CRL

const X509CRL updateCRL()(in X509CRL crl, auto ref const Vector!CRLEntry new_revoked, RandomNumberGenerator rng, Duration next_update = 0.seconds);
Create a new CRL by with additional entries.

Params:
X509CRL crl the last CRL of this CA to add the new entries to
Vector!CRLEntry new_revoked contains the new CRL entries to be added to the CRL
RandomNumberGenerator rng the random number generator to use
Duration next_update the time to set in next update in from now

X509Certificate makeCert(ALLOC)(ref PKSigner signer, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo, auto ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) pub_key, in X509Time not_before, in X509Time not_after, in X509DN issuer_dn, in X509DN subject_dn, in X509Extensions extensions);
Interface for creating new certificates

Params:
PKSigner signer a signing object
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator
AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo the signature algorithm identifier
Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) pub_key the serialized public key
X509Time not_before the start time of the certificate
X509Time not_after the end time of the certificate
X509DN issuer_dn the DN of the issuer
X509DN subject_dn the DN of the subject
X509Extensions extensions an optional list of certificate extensions

Returns:
s newly minted certificate

this(X509Certificate c, in PrivateKey key, in string hash_fn);
Create a new CA object. Load the certificate and private key

Params:
X509Certificate c the certificate of the CA
PrivateKey key the private key of the CA
string hash_fn name of a hash function to use for signing

PKSigner chooseSigFormat(in PrivateKey key, in string hash_fn, ref AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo);
Choose the default signature format for a certain public key signature scheme.

Params:
PrivateKey key will be the key to choose a padding scheme for
string hash_fn is the desired hash function
AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo will be set to the chosen scheme

Returns:
A PKSigner object for generating signatures
